xwikidoc.content:
### Macro "watchlist" rendering.macro.watchlist.name=Llista Seguiment ### Missing: rendering.macro.watchlist.description=Show the content of your current watchlist.
### XWiki.WatchListClass ### Missing: XWiki.WatchListClass_interval_realtime=Realtime ### Missing: XWiki.WatchListClass_interval_Scheduler.WatchListHourlyNotifier=Hourly ### Missing: XWiki.WatchListClass_interval_Scheduler.WatchListDailyNotifier=Daily ### Missing: XWiki.WatchListClass_interval_Scheduler.WatchListWeeklyNotifier=Weekly
### Notification Icons ### Missing: watchlist.notifications.icons.on=ON ### Missing: watchlist.notifications.icons.off=OFF ### Missing: watchlist.notifications.icons.tooltip.page=Watch this page ### Missing: watchlist.notifications.icons.tooltip.pageAndChildren=Watch this page and its children ### Missing: watchlist.notifications.icons.tooltip.space=Watch the parent page and its children ### Missing: watchlist.notifications.icons.tooltip.wiki=Watch this wiki ### Missing: watchlist.notifications.changeStatusError=Failed to change the status of the WatchList. watchlist.settings=Prefer√®ncies
### Watchlist livetable (in the macro) ### Missing: watchlist.table.scope.wiki=All pages of the wiki ### Missing: watchlist.table.scope.pageandchildren=Page + Children ### Missing: watchlist.table.scope.pageonly=Page Only ### Missing: watchlist.table.location=Location ### Missing: watchlist.table.scope=Scope
